Up for sale is a T205 Johnny Evers graded an Sgc 4. Shipping is included in the price shown. If interested please drop me an email.

Card has a couple surface creases that don't show on the back which run from the bottom border upward to his lip area. Otherwise the card displays EX.

$585 delivered (or you can make a fair offer which I may consider)

Thanks all, Tony
[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/threetwocount/threetwocount/t205eversfront.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/threetwocount/threetwocount/t205eversback.jpg[/IMG]
